book.title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
book.title_long: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship (Robert C. Martin Series)
book.synopsis: Even bad code can function. But if code isn't clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. Every year, countless hours and significant resources are lost because of poorly written code. But it doesn't have to be that way.
book.overview: This book is about writing clean code that works. It's about good practices in programming.
